subject: Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Pacman Jones, the suspended Dallas Cowboys cornerback, said he had sent a letter to N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell asking to be allowed to play this season.
snippet: Pacman Jones, the suspended Dallas Cowboys cornerback, said he had sent a letter to N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell asking to be allowed to play this season.
